description:
Play your AP as a SBURB session, each player only has items for themselves and a single other person
in a big circular chain.

v1.0.0.description: Turn your AP sessions into SBURB ones by chaining worlds together in a ring! Each player only has their own or the next player's items in slot order.
v1.0.0.title: Initial release

v1.1.0.description:
This release adds a bunch of options to customize your SBURB session.

Choose whether the Medium is a true SBURB session, a ring, or a dual ring, whether the order of players is randomized, and whether only progression items are subject to these rules(helps with generating consistently).

You can now also add worlds to Skaia, the centerpoint of the session. These worlds will have the ability to send and receive any items to/from all players, making it possible to play otherwise extremely restrictive games for the SBURB structure, like a central bingo or a few Cliques for fun.

**NOTE**: To be able to clean up after itself and not show up on the uploaded multiworld as a perpetually non-goaled empty slot, this meta world now requires itself to be the final slot in the world. Rename the yaml accordingly.
v1.1.0.title: SBURBelago 1.1 - Options!

v2.0.0.description:
Now with multislot capabilities, full customization of the Medium, optional deletion from the multiworld, and more!

Also the spoiler log now has a printout of the resulting topology in `dot` format, use your favourite graphviz renderer to have a look!
v2.0.0.title: SBURBelago 2.0 - All of the customization!

v2.1.0.description:
This release adds two features:

- Use slot numbers instead of or alongside of player names, for the cases where the player name gets rolled by a random option
- Use of an empty medium_topo for skaia-only connections.
v2.1.0.title: SBURBelago 2.1 - Slot numbers
